title: Pixel 2 XL microphones not working.
content: Hello, few days ago my microphones (Pixel 2 xl) stopped working. I tried sound recorders, video recorders, phone calls on different apps also assistant not working, only song recognition works. I did factory reset and after this google assistent worked only when i say "Ok google" it starts but after starting not working again. After one update the "Ok google" also stopped working. Any idea what to do?
